name: Flow // Mens
description:
“Geometry existed before the creation.”
— Plato

“If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.”
— Nikola Tesla

“Learn how to see. Realize that everything connects to everything else.”
— Leonardo da Vinci

Everything that exist is a result of a frequency. Ancient geometrical patterns show how energy flows and manifests itself... just like how certain flowers grow the way they do (like how a sunflower bursts out exponentially in different directions following the fibonacci sequence), they follow and obey universal laws. They’re everywhere underlying in nature. Geometry is the poetry of nature. Transcend, illuminate, and elevate your consciousness; let your third eye flow.

name: Fruit of Life // Mens
description:
The 13 circles represent the 13 Energy Centers of our Galaxy. The center circle is the first energy, the Earth Gateway, it is the mirror reflection of the 13th Energy, the Cosmic Gateway. “As Above, So Below”.

The Fruit of Life symbol is made of 13 circles taken from the Flower of Life. The Fruit of Life is said to be the blue- print of the universe, containing the basis for the design of every atom, molecular structure, life form, and everything in existence. It contains the geometric basis for the delineation of what’s known as Metatron’s Cube, which brings forth the platonic solids. If each circle’s center is considered a “node”, and each node is connected to each other node with a single line, a total of seventy-eight lines are created, forming the Metatron’s Cube.
